title: FS/FT: Mid to higher graded Hofers
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Mid to higher graded Hofers
posts.post_content: I have many, mostly graded by PSA and some by SGC. I have some 4's, but most are graded 5 and up. Please let me know if you might be looking for a particular card....Thanks

posts.post_title: can ya put a list out?
